byline.original: TEXT and PHOTOGRAPHS by LAUREN JUSTICE

abstract: Photos from American Ultimate Disc League exhibition match between Madison Radicals and Japanese team Buzz Bullets, first international ultimate Frisbee game to be held in Madison, Wis; Radicals defeat Bullets, 28-21.
lead_paragraph: Madison, Wis., played host to a global ultimate Frisbee event that pitted the local Madison Radicals against the Buzz Bullets, a world-class team from Japan.

headline.main: Where Disc Meets Globe: An International Exhibition of Ultimate Frisbee
headline.print_headline: Where Disc Meets Globe: An International Exhibition

snippet: Madison, Wis., played host to a global ultimate Frisbee event that pitted the local Madison Radicals against the Buzz Bullets, a world-class team from Japan.
